actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to authorize the enrollment of qualified Klamath Indians in Bureau of Indian Affairs residential schools.

summary.text: Authorizes the enrollment of qualified Klamath Indians in Bureau of Indian Affairs residential schools or institutes of higher education, and establishes their eligibility for scholarship aid while enrolled at institutions of higher education not operated by the Bureau.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the enrollment of qualified Klamath Indians in Bureau of Indian Affairs residential schools.
